title: Context for the Indian liberal view of women

content.question: The Indian liberal view of women discussed in the passage is best understood in the context of which of the following?

choices.label: Changes in gender roles as a result of Indian industrialization
Emerging women’s suffrage and feminist movements
The predominantly male migration of Indian indentured labor overseas
The development of more effective means of birth control

content.answer: Emerging women’s suffrage and feminist movements

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
